title: NS/SOA Consistency Checker
subtitle: Verify DNS nameserver and SOA (Start of Authority) record consistency. Check that all listed nameservers resolve correctly and analyze SOA parameters for proper DNS configuration.

form.title: NS/SOA Check
form.domainTooltip: Enter the domain to check nameserver and SOA consistency for

soa.title: SOA (Start of Authority) Record
soa.primaryNSTooltip: The primary nameserver for this zone
soa.administratorTooltip: Email address of the zone administrator (@ replaced with .)
soa.serialTooltip: Zone serial number - used to track zone changes
soa.refreshTooltip: How often secondary servers should check for updates
soa.retryTooltip: How long to wait before retrying a failed zone transfer
soa.expireTooltip: When secondary servers should stop answering queries if they can't contact the primary

analysis.title: Configuration Analysis
analysis.serialYYYYMMDDNN: Serial number appears to use YYYYMMDDNN format (recommended)
analysis.serialSuggestion: Consider using YYYYMMDDNN format for serial numbers for easier tracking
analysis.refreshGood: Refresh interval ({time}) is within recommended range
analysis.refreshTooFrequent: Refresh interval ({time}) is quite frequent - consider increasing
analysis.refreshTooLong: Refresh interval ({time}) is quite long - consider reducing
analysis.retryTooLong: Retry interval should be less than refresh interval
analysis.retryTooShort: Retry interval ({time}) might be too short
analysis.expireShort: Expire time ({time}) is quite short - consider at least 1 week
